metadata.description: OOP four pillars, SOLID, clean code (DRY, KISS, YAGNI, Law of Demeter), composition over inheritance, and relationship types (association, aggregation, composition) with example code for AI agents and developers.

plugins.name: core-engineering
plugins.description: Core Engineering skill: Object-Oriented Design (Abstraction, Encapsulation, Inheritance, Polymorphism), SOLID principles, composition over inheritance, DRY/KISS/YAGNI/LoD, and association vs aggregation vs composition. Each principle includes how it looks and TypeScript examples.
